body.p: Born on February 25, 1834 in Middlesborough, Massachusetts. Graduated from West Point on July 1, 1855. Served in Third Seminole War. Served as Professor of Geography, History and Ethics at West Point. First Lieutenant 1st Artillery from 1861 to 1862. Promoted to Captain on November 19, 1861. Became assent adjutant general of General Irvin McDowell on November 29, 1861. Died in February 1918.
